featured.text: Stretch limousines were hired to drive the prom-goers to expensive restaurants or discos for an all-night extravaganza.

definition.zh_def: 盛會；華麗的表演或活動
definition.en_def: A spectacular event or performance, often involving elaborate displays or entertainment.
definition.example: The festival was an extravagant extravaganza filled with music, dance, and colorful decorations.
